name: Alchemists Dungeon
description:
The game was created within 48 hours during GMTK Game Jam 2021. Theme is "Joined together".

Game developers:

  • Pavel Tanonov, Discord: Tnnv#2133
  • Patrick Spack aka Evolor, Discord: Evolor#4684
  • Delphine Spack, Discord: Delphi#5544

Game description:

  • mix ingredients and brew all sorts of potions. 
  • discover new recipes. 
  • use your creations to navigate the dungeon. 
  • unravel the secrets of the dungeon and it's sad history

Game features random recipes and potion effects. Each playthrough will require different solution.
